Description :
        Sorang Flower Art Shop, Pertempuran Sorang, Sorang,Sorang's Flower Art Shop,Sorang Workshop,, at manhwawebsiteSorang's one wish is to abandon the sluggish life of a half-human, half-goblin and become the perfect Korean goblin. However, when she crosses paths with a special human named Sujo in her shop, Sorang Studio, a budding romance forms. Will their different goals cause friction, or will they grow together?Maybe you like !
